snippet: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. will arrive onstage Thursday as the president’s most important political partner, policy enforcer, conscience, scold and occasional albatross.
abstract: Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr's speech at the Democratic National Convention will likely be carefully controlled, aiming to avoid the gaffes and moments of honesty that have given fodder to Biden and Pres Obama's political rivals in the past; speculation remains that Biden will nonetheless use speech to keep his options open for a presidential bid in 2016.
lead_paragraph: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. will arrive onstage Thursday as the president’s most important political partner, policy enforcer, conscience, scold and occasional albatross.

headline.seo: Biden’s Speech Likely to Highlight Strengths or Foibles
headline.main: Biden’s Speech Likely to Spotlight Strengths, or Foibles
headline.print_headline: Biden’s Speech Likely to Spotlight Strengths, or Foibles
